title: Gelateria Mos Eisley
description: Small gelateria close to the Tempelhofer Feld. Makes made-in-house gelato fresh daily. Does not use additives or artificial flavors. Offers plenty of vegan fruit sorbets, various vegan gelati with soy milk, including boozy alcoholic flavors like whisky and dark chocolate or beer sorbet. Try the pineapple/basil or grapefruit/tarragon vegan sorbets. Menu changes daily.
